name: BloomHaven
description: Brand New Virtual Board Game that let the users experience the fantasy world with the new 3d technology.

name: Murder of the Mouse
description: A horror thriller boardgame that features a big mouse killer and 4 survivors that will need to work together in order to survive.

name: Hat Helicopter
description: An innovative hat that will lift the user off the ground. Discretion is advised. No refund.

name: Leg Booster
description: Let you fly in the air for a short period of time. Can also fly across water surfaces.

name: Thrilling Retractor
description: Knife that will retract 50% of the time.

name: AI virtual character of Matthew McConaughey
description: A virtual Matthew McConaughey that will play whatever role you wish him to be.

name: The House on the Pleasant Hill
description: A boardgame that will pit you against your fellow teammates, for one of them is working against the team!
